tasks.title: Integrate Hierarchical Temporal Memory Planner into simulation loop
Run Domain‑Agnostic Embedding Alignment on vision‑language datasets
Implement Dynamic Depth Controller for Self‑Recursive Transformer
Extend Modular Sensor‑Actuator Interface to real robot arm
Build Integrated Capability Graph (ICG) orchestration layer

alternate_task_sets.title: Implement Meta‑Learning Scheduler prototype
alternate_task_sets.description: Create a runnable meta‑learning scheduler that can ingest loss signals from downstream tasks and adjust hyper‑parameters.

alternate_task_sets.title: Build Recursive Reasoning Core (RRC)
alternate_task_sets.description: Develop the depth‑bounded inference engine with decomposition/composition hooks.

alternate_task_sets.title: Create Embodiment Simulation Wrapper
alternate_task_sets.description: Integrate a lightweight physics sandbox (e.g., PyBullet) and expose an execute(action_sequence) API.

alternate_task_sets.title: Define Benchmark Suite and CI integration
alternate_task_sets.description: Assemble puzzles, cross‑domain transfer tests, and long‑term planning benchmarks; add to CI pipeline.

alternate_task_sets.title: Integrate Safety Guardrails
alternate_task_sets.description: Implement runtime checks (output bounds, resource limits, alignment predicates) and hook them into AGISystem.

alternate_task_sets.title: Prototype Hierarchical Meta‑Learning Stack
alternate_task_sets.description: Stack two meta‑learners: one for weight‑level adaptation, one for architecture‑level adaptation.

alternate_task_sets.title: Cross‑Domain Transfer Engine
alternate_task_sets.description: Build shared latent space and elastic weight consolidation to prevent forgetting.

alternate_task_sets.title: Long‑Term Planning Module
alternate_task_sets.description: Implement temporal abstraction layer with Monte‑Carlo Tree Search pruning.

alternate_task_sets.title: Full System Integration & End‑to‑End Test
alternate_task_sets.description: Wire ReasoningCore, Scheduler, EmbodimentInterface, and SafetyGuardrail into AGISystem and run the benchmark suite.

alternate_task_sets.title: Red‑Team Safety Evaluation
alternate_task_sets.description: Conduct adversarial safety testing on the integrated system; iterate on guardrails.

alternate_task_sets.title: Create safe recursion sandbox with checkpointing
Run meta‑learning curriculum on planning policies
Extend recursion depth experiment to 10 layers
Integrate MetaLearner with Reasoner (shared latent space)
Full self‑improvement loop with safety guardrails
Implement IntegrationHub and core module stubs
Scale recursion depth to 5 and benchmark
Benchmark suite expansion (MATH, ARC, Atari, embodied tasks)
Build cross‑domain data loader and benchmark suite
Connect planner to MuJoCo embodiment sandbox
Full AGI loop end‑to‑end validation on benchmark suite
Export Novel Reasoning module with clean API
Integrate NSR and Alignment into baseline evaluation harness
Train Meta‑Learning controller on 50 synthetic tasks
Expand evaluation suite (recursion depth, meta‑learning speed)
Publish AGI‑BASELINE v2 results and open‑source core components
Implement unified embedding gateway
alternate_task_sets.description: Wrap a sentence‑transformer model behind the EmbeddingGateway interface and expose a REST endpoint for internal services.

alternate_task_sets.title: Safety sandbox with recursion‑depth guard
alternate_task_sets.description: Develop the SimpleSafetySandbox with configurable depth limits and integrate termination‑prediction model.

alternate_task_sets.title: Baseline evaluation CI pipeline
alternate_task_sets.description: Automate nightly runs of the AGI_BASELINE_REPORT benchmark suite and publish regression metrics.

alternate_task_sets.title: Hierarchical reasoning integration
alternate_task_sets.description: Connect SymbolicReasoner to the embedding service and implement dynamic theorem‑proving loops.

alternate_task_sets.title: MAML‑style meta‑learning adapter
alternate_task_sets.description: Implement fast‑adaptation layer that can fine‑tune on new domains with a single gradient step.

alternate_task_sets.title: Virtual embodiment pipeline
alternate_task_sets.description: Integrate Unity/IsaacGym simulator, expose proprioceptive API, and connect to Planner.

alternate_task_sets.title: Hierarchical RL planner (options framework)
alternate_task_sets.description: Develop option‑based planner with temporal abstraction and connect to world‑model updater.

alternate_task_sets.title: Dual‑loop meta‑optimizer
alternate_task_sets.description: Create outer‑loop optimizer that learns learning‑rate schedules for inner‑loop meta‑learning.

alternate_task_sets.title: Integrated AGI demo (reason‑plan‑act)
alternate_task_sets.description: Orchestrate end‑to‑end scenario: solve a puzzle, synthesize a tool, and use it in simulation.
Implement depth‑aware attention wrapper for RecursiveReasoningEngine (max_depth=5).
Create MetaLearningScheduler skeleton with 20 planning primitives.
Set up CI/CD pipeline (Docker + GitHub Actions) for rapid module testing.
Scale RecursiveReasoningEngine to depth=20 using reversible layers.
Train CrossDomainLatentMapper on unified multimodal dataset.
Integrate EmbodiedLoop with MuJoCo simulation for pick‑and‑place task.
Develop AGI‑Eval benchmark suite (multi‑modal, multi‑step).
Implement SafetyGuard module and automated safety regression tests.
Write integration documentation and API contracts for all modules.

alternate_task_sets.title: Implement hierarchical meta‑reasoning engine (Phase 1)
alternate_task_sets.description: Create a prototype ReasoningEngine with proof‑trace API and integrate with existing baseline.

alternate_task_sets.title: Train cross‑modal contrastive encoder
alternate_task_sets.description: Fine‑tune the encoder on image‑text and audio‑text pairs; publish checkpoint.

alternate_task_sets.title: Add depth‑budget manager to task scheduler
alternate_task_sets.description: Extend RecursiveScheduler to enforce recursion limits and expose monitoring metrics.

alternate_task_sets.title: Integrate Phase 1 components into AGI architecture
alternate_task_sets.description: Wire ReasoningEngine, CrossModalEncoder, and Scheduler into agi_capability_architecture.py.

alternate_task_sets.title: Develop Hierarchical Temporal Planner (HTA + MCTS)
alternate_task_sets.description: Implement Phase 2 planner with abstraction layers and Monte‑Carlo Tree Search.

alternate_task_sets.title: Build gradient‑based meta‑learner controller
alternate_task_sets.description: Create MetaLearner that can adapt to new tasks within 5 gradient steps.

alternate_task_sets.title: Deploy virtual embodiment sandbox
alternate_task_sets.description: Set up physics engine, expose act() API, and connect to planner outputs.

alternate_task_sets.title: Implement scalable sharded memory store
alternate_task_sets.description: Design vector store with attention‑based routing; ensure low‑latency retrieval.

alternate_task_sets.title: Full AGI closed‑loop integration
alternate_task_sets.description: Combine reasoning, planning, meta‑learning, memory, and embodiment into a single run_cycle.

alternate_task_sets.title: Safety verification of recursion depth guarantees
alternate_task_sets.description: Formal‑verify that RecursiveScheduler never exceeds its budget; add runtime guards.

alternate_task_sets.title: Benchmark suite implementation
alternate_task_sets.description: Create benchmark tasks covering reasoning, perception, planning, and adaptation; define success thresholds.

alternate_task_sets.title: Production containerization and auto‑scaling setup
alternate_task_sets.description: Dockerize the AGI pipeline, configure Kubernetes auto‑scaling on GPU nodes.
